Text:
P.S: For security, all files are packed in a SFX-archives, therefore, have a slightly larger size and expansion .exe (just unpack archives in the right place for you and then act on instructions given to the file)

NoIntro Fix
http://shareflare.net/download/0921.027c5160cd815aa345228de67/DarkVoid_NoIntroFix.exe.html

NoCD / NoDVD v1.0 EN/ RU [XP / Vista / 7]
Installation: Extract the files in a folder with game replacing the original.
http://shareflare.net/download/1195.da1cee7f5c4b47c6b12b25e12/DarkVoid_NoDVD.exe.html

Russifier text [1C]
Installation: Run the installer and specify the path to the folder with the game.

Savegame (covered in hard, everything is open, all improved, collected 40-60% of journals)
-Open all the chapters
Game-passed at the level of "hard"
Open-level of complexity "hardcore"
-Improved radar at the start of the new game shows Journals, Bonuses and all NPCs
-All weapons openly
-All the equipment is improved to a maximum level
-Magazines are collected at 40-60%
Raspokovat in: 
C:\Users\%username%\Documents\My Games\Airtight\Dark Void
http://shareflare.net/download/0750.045b81584bfb5460c0b41b91f/DarkVoid_Savegame_100.exe.html

Trainer (infinite acceleration)
Options: 
Numpad 6: Unlimited Jet Boost
http://shareflare.net/download/8231.84f3a35468120165e9e7173c7/DarkVoid_Trainer_1.exe.html

Trainer [+10]
Options:
Num0 1 Infinite Health
Num1 2 One-Hit Kill
Num2 3 Infinite Jetpack Boost
Num3 4 Infinite Ammo/Nades/No Reload
Num4 5 Add 10,000 Tech Points
Num5 6 Low Gravity/Moon Jump
Num6 7 Super Speed 
Num7 8 Slow Enemies
Num8 9 Freeze Entities 
Num / 10 Save Position \
Num * - Restore Position |> Teleport System
Num - - Undo Last Teleport /
